g-0: ^She seemed harsh at first, but she turned out to be pretty nice.
^She can be tough, but she really does care about people.
^The moment she recognizes you as someone trustworthy, she'll look after you like one of her own.
g-1: ^She also said you owe her a favor for this.
^Ack! Man, she went easy on you. So much for tough love...
^Alright, I'll take care of that later.
^Now, back to brass tasks... Got what we need?
g-2: ^Let's get that X fixed up. Be done in a jiffy!
^[You hear a collection of bangs and clanks until he pops back out, wiping sweat off his brow.]
^But don't even think about taking it outside the archipelago just yet!
^It's going to need a lot more work done before it's safe.
g-3: ^That's what I'm here for. Let's move on to the next upgrade.
^Considering it must be a long way home from here...
^You'll need to stock up on provisions before you even attempt that journey.
^Your folks' boat could use a bigger inventory deck.
^For that, we'll need Z. Irma has some on her island, last I heard.
^She's an electrician of sorts. Loves to tinker on radios and what have you.
^Hey, maybe she could get that radio on your boat fixed up!
^Would be nice with some tunes while you're out boating, wouldn't it?
^Ah, but I'm getting ahead of myself- inventory first! Z!
g-4: ^Irma's island is to the southeast of Sigrid's. You can't miss it!
